message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it! Would you like to make an offer to buy it from me for $120?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $100. I can do $110, and that's as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $105?
I'm getting a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle, Bob. I can do $108, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. If you're still not interested, I have other buyers waiting
I understand you're getting concerned, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $106?
I'm not going to go any lower than $110, Bob. I think you're getting a great deal, and I'm willing to meet you halfway between $106 and $110. How about $108 isn't an option, but $108.50 is?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $107?
I'm not going to go any lower than $110, Bob. I think we've been negotiating for a while, and I'm willing to give you a slight discount, but I need to make a profit. How about $109?
